title: Summer Wedding Guest Dresses For Every Dress Code
description: Finding a wedding guest dress you feel confident and comfortable in is no small feat. Add the complexities of dressing for summer — hello, wrinkly fabrics and visible sweat marks — and you’ve got yourself a full-blown shopping project. The good news? You don't have to spend your weekend braving fluorescent-lit dressing rooms to find the perfect summer wedding guest dress. Whether you’re looking for a breezy dress for a beach wedding, a formal gown for a black-tie ceremony, or a slip dress that works across a myriad of dress codes, we’ve got you covered.Ahead, we’ve rounded up the 28 best summer dresses for every type of wedding — from casual to cocktail — in a wide range of sizes, styles, and price points from Refinery29 reader-favorite retailers like Nordstrom, Anthropologie, and Hill House Home. All that’s left to do? Put on your dancing shoes and raise a glass to the happy couple.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Beach & Destination Wedding Guest DressesEmbrace your inner mermaid for destination and beach weddings. This is your moment to lean into the breezy, slightly more casual dress code — think linen maxis, floral prints, and halter necklines you’ll want to wear all season long.
